title: 351 of 2020)), and the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (National Car
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (National Car 

Test) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited road traffic (national car test) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2025

title: 351 of 2020)), and the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2)
heading: 2. Regulation 6 of the Road Traffic (National Car Test) Regulations 2017
text_raw:
2. Regulation 6 of the Road Traffic (National Car Test) Regulations 2017 

(S.I. No. 415 of 2017) is amended— 

(a) 

by the substitution for paragraph (1) of the following: 

“(1) Subject to paragraphs (2) and (3), the fee to be paid for a 

test shall be— 

(a) 

other than in the case of a re-test, €48.78, and 

(b) 

in the case of a re-test, €32.52.”, 

and 

(b) 

in paragraph (3), by the substitution for subparagraph (b) of the 
following: 

“(b) 

 in respect of an appointment for- 

(i) 

(ii) 

a test, €19.51 for each occasion on which the vehicle 
was not presented for the test at the appointed time 
and place, or 

a re-test, €13.00 for each occasion on which the 
vehicle was not presented for a re-test at the appointed 
time and place (other than in circumstances referred 
to in paragraph (2)).”. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
4 December, 2024. 

JAMES LAWLESS, 

Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [672] 3

title: 351 of 2020)), and the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend Regulation 6 of the Road Traffic (National Car Test) 
Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 415 of 2017) to increase the cost of a full test, a retest and the cost for the non-presentation of a vehicle. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [672]
